definition: mesh laundry bag (for keeping garments separate from others in the washing machine)

sentences.english: Water Proof Switch, Used for electric kettle, Washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 防水开关，用于电水壶，洗衣机。

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.
sentences.chinese: 有些衣物则不宜用洗衣机洗涤，否则将得不偿失。

sentences.english: People washing clothes by the river.
sentences.chinese: 人们在石潭河边洗衣服。

sentences.english: Pet Health Animal Clinic, G/F, 24 Sai Yee Street, Mongkok, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 柏得康动物诊所，香港九龙旺角洗衣街24号地下。

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有全新的洗衣机，浴缸，跑步机和电视机。

sentences.english: This clothes washer was meant to be used in areas where water is scarce and electricity isn’t available.
sentences.chinese: 这种滚动式的洗衣机适用于缺水少电的地区。

sentences.english: Daway, come and help me do a laundry.

sentences.chinese: 滚筒式双层玻璃洗衣机。

sentences.english: Uncle and aunt launched a laundry with the blunt hunter.
sentences.chinese: 伯伯和伯母与直率的猎人创办了一家洗衣店。

sentences.english: Ensure all used amenities are replaced especially laundry bags and laundry lists.
sentences.chinese: 调换所有用过的客用品特别是洗衣袋和洗衣单。

sentences.english: Ensure all used amenities are replaced especially laundry bags and laundry lists.
sentences.chinese: 调换所有用过的客用品特别是洗衣袋和洗衣单。

sentences.english: Before washing the clothes, froth up the soap mixture.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣之前先把皂液搅起泡沫。

sentences.english: Twenty laundries were burned that night.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上，华人开设的洗衣店就有二十家被付之一炬。

definition: to mop the floor/(of a gown etc) to trail on the ground/full-length
to sweep the floor/to reach rock bottom/to be at an all-time low
